Articles.Content:
Summer time has fallen upon Kerbal Space Program, and (deciding to not to do the most generic Summer stuff) Kerbals want to enjoy it in style. Post screenshots or Artwork (should you wish to) of your Kerbals enjoying the summer in the most coolest or craziest ways possible.

For example;

Coroly Kermin EVAed during a mission and built a deckchair out of Solar Panels, and later reused a Satilite Dish for a cheep umbrella;

Post away!

--Fred_Cop--

Great ! Feel free to add them in the Summertime, yay ! thread ; )

For once, I will share something I have not made. This was originally posted by L3GO right here.

I hope he'll forgive me, but this is what I consider one of the best, most touching screen capture from KSP I've ever seen. You have all my admiration for this one, L3GO.

Edited July 2, 2015 by Plume & Akakak
